name: MOWING: The Means of Producktion
description:
(This EXPERIENCE is a SEQUEL to MOWING. Playing MOWING first is not REQUIRED or RECOMMENDED. Please do not play MOWING.)

The time has come, comrades. Join me and we shall save the human from the clutches of the dastardly King's Ducks!

HUMMUS and his DUCK COMRADES fly over a DESERT of GRAY SAND! WHERE could they be GOING?!

OH, SHOOT! The vile KING'S DUCKS have ABDUCKTED an INNOCENT HUMAN PERSON and his poor LAWN MOWER! It's up to you, HUMMUS the INTERDIMENSIONAL COMMUNIST ROBOT DUCK to SAVE the human from their HEINOUS GRASP!

The KING'S DUCKS taunt Hummus and Linda! How absolutely CRUEL!

NAVIGATE the interior of a TREACHEROUS AIRSHIP while MOWING down GRASS to open the way FORWARD! Enjoy five PROHIBITIVELY DIFFICULT levels, each one more of a CHALLENGE than the last! All while DISMANTLING an OUTDATED MONARCHY and establishing a COMMUNIST PARADISE!

DISCOVER the DEEP HISTORY of the expansive WORLD of MOWING!

Don't miss out on this EXPERIENCE! Hummus and his DUCK COMRADES need you TODAY!

THIS is a LIGHT BULB!

MOWING: The Means of Producktion will take one to two hours to reach one of two endings. The game will not save your progress. Keyboard/mouse and gamepad are supported as input devices. Please report any bugs to cci.mowing@gmail.com
